monitoringPlanCommentData.monitoringPlanComment: An annual span and range evaluation was performed during third quarter, which resulted in switcing from dual ranges to single ranges of the NOx and SO2 analyzers in the CS004 CEMS.  The changes were based on historical data, required the purchase of new calibration gasses and were made on November 27, 2017 at 0800.

I certify that for the housr in which NOx lb/mmBtu data is substituted, the NOx emission controls, as needed to comply with the permit, were operating properly and that the substitute values recorded during the quarter do not systematically underestimate emissions.  I further certify that for the hours in which SO2 ppm data is substituted, the add-on SO2 emission control (i.e., FGD) was operating properly and that the substitute values recorded during the quarter do not systematically underestimate emissions.
Added a like kind SO2 analyzer (Componenet ID:  LK1) to CS4 SO2 Systen (C40) on Jun3 19, 2019.

Based on current operation, Unit 1 is only operating when Unit 2 is already operating.  The minimum stable load for this stack is equivalent to the miniumum, stable load for Unit 2.  This wil be updated in the future if the manner of the unit(s) changes.

Performed a load analysis in preparation for ongoing QA RATA.  The analysis indicated that the normal and second normal load levels have changed from low and mid respecitvely to low and high.  This monitoring plan submission includes the updated Load records.

I certify that for the housr in which NOx lb/mmBtu data is substituted, the NOx emission controls, as needed to comply with the permit, were operating properly and that the substitute values recorded during the quarter do not systematically underestimate emissions.  I further certify that for the hours in which SO2 ppm data is substituted, the add-on SO2 emission control (i.e., FGD) was operating properly and that the substitute values recorded during the quarter do not systematically underestimate emissions.

monitoringFormulaData.formulaText: Total HI unit1 = F#(HI1) * T_CS + (F#(025) * T_MS001)  / T1
Total HI unit2 = (F#(019) * T_CS/T2) * ((MW2 * T2) / (MW1 * T1 + MW2 * T2))
